entry.data:
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
